page.title: 19TRADE
page.content: AT LLANLIEU, ACROSS FROM THE NOW RESTORED MEDIEVAL CHURCH, IS THE ONLY SHOP IN THE AREA - A POTTERY WITH AN ART GALLERY. THIS IS A HUSBAND AND WIFE CONCERN WITH THE WIFE MAKING THE POPULAR BLACK MOUNTAIN POTTERY AND THE HUSBAND PAINTING. MANY SHOPS IN THE SURROUNDING TOWNS AND VILLAGES SELL THE DISTINCTIVE POTTERY. THE OTHER TRADE IN THE AREA IS CONCERNED WITH ATTRACTING VISITORS TO THE AREA TO ENJOY THE COUNTRYSIDE ON HORSEBACK. THERE ARE TWO COMMERCIAL CENTRES IN THE AREA AND ONE OUTDOOR CENTRE USED BY AN EDUCATION AUTHORITY. ANOTHER LARGE HOUSE CATERS FOR SLIGHTLY LESS ENERGETIC OUTDOOR PURSUITS SUCH AS WALKING AND ARCHERY AND TENDS TO ATTRACT A OLDER CLIENTELE THAN DO THE TREKKING AND OUTDOOR ACTVITY CENTRES.
